215240.name: Sleeping Dogs: Retro Triad Pack
215240.description: Go old school with a killer look and ride straight out of the 80s! New hair, accessories, clothes and boots are combined with an 80s style kung fu van to complete the look. Items come with their own buffs, increasing your damage resistance, Triad and Face experience and striking damage. With this new look everyone will know you are big trouble on the streets of Hong Kong.
215240.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语, 法语, 意大利语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 波兰语, 俄语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
